N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-3.12 - Hair and grooming areas

State Regulations

Separate room(s) shall be provided for hair care and
grooming needs of residents. The space and equipment provided shall be
commensurate with the number of residents within the facility. At least one
sink for staff handwashing shall be provided that is trimmed with valves that
are operable without the use of hands. There shall be another sink that may be
used to wash hair. Resident toilets shall be readily accessible to the hair and
grooming area(s). Notes
